item.title: 日本在七国集团会议前的最新谈判中寻求关税审查
item.description: 日本最高贸易谈判代表赤泽亮世表示，日本将在本月举行的领导人峰会前的最后一次部长级会谈中坚持其寻求审查美国所有关税的立场。【原文：Japan will stick to its stance of seeking a review of all US tariffs in what could be the final ministerial-level talks ahead of a leaders’ summit this month, the nation’s top trade negotiator Ryosei Akazawa said.】

item.title: Vingroup 寻求私人贷款购买 KKR 在 Vinschool 的股份
item.description: 据知情人士透露，越南企业集团 Vingroup JSC 正在寻求约 3 亿美元的私人信用贷款，以购买 KKR & Co.【原文：Vietnamese conglomerate Vingroup JSC is seeking an around $300 million private credit loan to purchase KKR & Co.’s stake of about 38% in its education subsidiary Vinschool, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称金佰利接近出售全球卫生纸业务
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》援引不愿透露姓名的知情人士的话报道，金佰利公司（Kimberly-Clark Corp.【原文：Kimberly-Clark Corp. is close to a roughly $3.5 billion sale of its global Kleenex and tissue businesses outside of North America, the Wall Street Journal reported, citing unidentified people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贸易战停战后中国服务业活动回升
item.description: 一项民间调查显示，5 月份中国服务业活动增速加快，这表明消费经济正在企稳，而美国提高关税威胁到出口需求。【原文：China’s services activity expanded at a faster pace in May, a private survey showed, in a sign the consumer economy is stabilizing while higher US tariffs threaten demand for exports.】

item.title: 澳大利亚消费保持疲软，消费者等待销售机会
item.description: 由于消费者将闲置资金用于外出就餐等服务而非服装和汽车等商品，澳大利亚4月份的家庭支出依然不温不火。【原文：Australia’s household spending remained tepid in April as consumers directed their spare cash to services like eating out rather than goods such as clothing and cars.】

item.title: 地产巨头新世界的债务困境为何令香港人心惶惶？
item.description: 香港顶级房地产开发商之一新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：Bankers in Hong Kong are on edge as New World Development Co., one of the city’s top real estate developers, attempts to pull off an HK$87.5 billion ($11.2 billion) refinancing deal by the end of the month.】

item.title: 黄金签证为何悄然卷土重来？
item.description:
本周的澳大利亚播客：主持人丽贝卡-琼斯（Rebecca Jones）与财富编辑安斯利-汤姆森（Ainsley Thomson）谈论新西兰为何欢迎黄金签证—以及富有的外籍人士。【原文：

On this week’s Australia Podcast: Host Rebecca Jones speaks to wealth editor Ainsley Thomson about why New Zealand is embracing golden visas — and wealthy expats.

item.title: 老铺黄金暴涨 2,300% 成为香港最贵股票
item.description: 老铺黄金有限公司（Laopu Gold Co., Ltd.）令人惊叹的涨势已将其股价推高至 1,000 港元（合 127 美元）以上，这是一个罕见的里程碑，反映出这家珠宝制造商正在成为中国奢侈品的新面孔。【原文：A breathtaking rally in Laopu Gold Co. has pushed its stock price to above HK$1,000 ($127), a rare milestone that reflects the jewelry maker’s emergence as the new face of Chinese luxury.】

item.title: Blackstone 为天职合并牵头融资 15 亿美元
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 主导了一项约 15 亿美元的私人信贷交易，以支持 Baker Tilly 与 Moss Adams 的合并。【原文：Blackstone Inc. led a private credit deal of around $1.5 billion to support Baker Tilly’s merger with Moss Adams, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 23andMe 的 DNA 数据在新一轮拍卖中获得 3.05 亿美元的高价竞拍
item.description: 破产的基因分析公司 23andMe 将对其 DNA 数据库进行第二次拍卖，由该公司前首席执行官安妮-沃西基（Anne Wojcicki）领导的集团以 3.05 亿美元的起拍价竞拍。【原文：Bankrupt genetic analysis company 23andMe will hold a second auction for its cache of DNA data with an opening bid of $305 million from group lead by the company’s former chief executive officer, Anne Wojcicki.】

item.title: 美元下跌，美银美林的豪纳预计新兴市场会有更多涨幅
item.description: 据博发证券（Bofa Securities）称，由于预期美元将继续下跌，新兴市场资产今年有望实现 "数个百分点 "的回报。【原文：Emerging-market assets look poised to deliver “several percent” returns this year on expectations of a continued decline in the US dollar, according to Bofa Securities.】

item.title: 据说IBM在Salesforce交易前曾追逐Informatica
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在 Salesforce 公司上个月以 80 亿美元收购 Informatica 软件公司之前，国际商用机器公司（International Business Machines Corp.【原文：International Business Machines Corp. pursued Informatica Inc. before Salesforce Inc. bought the software company for $8 billion last month, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克的人工智能初创公司将获得 TPG 的债务支持
item.description: 据知情人士透露，TPG Angelo Gordon 是埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能初创公司 xAI Corp.【原文：TPG Angelo Gordon is an anchor investor in a debt package for Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup, xAI Corp., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Uber 和 DoorDash 与纽约解决配送费上限争议
item.description: DoorDash 公司、Grubhub 公司和优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：DoorDash Inc., Grubhub Inc. and Uber Technologies Inc.’s Uber Eats are settling a 2021 lawsuit against New York City over a cap on fees the meal-delivery services can charge restaurants.】

item.title: 中国电价大幅下调，为受电价影响的工厂雪中送炭
item.description: 中国煤炭价格的暴跌和清洁能源的大量涌入，正在降低主要工业中心的电价，从而缓解了一些在与美国的贸易敌对行动中受到冲击的工厂所承受的压力。【原文：A crash in Chinese coal prices, and a flood of clean energy, are cutting power rates in major industrial hubs, easing pressure on some of the factories caught in the crossfire of trade hostilities with the US.】

item.title: 新加坡 AAA 级债券为美国套利交易提供了机会
item.description: 在美国失去最后一个 AAA 信用评级后，亚洲一些最安全的资产为投资者提供了高于国债的收益率。【原文：Some of the safest assets in Asia offer investors a yield pickup to Treasuries in the wake of the US losing its last AAA credit rating.】

item.title: 美国数据疲软支撑美联储降息预期，黄金保持涨势
item.description: 在弱于预期的美国数据强化了美联储今年将至少降息两次以防止经济衰退的预期之后，黄金保持涨势。【原文：Gold held gains, after weaker-than-expected US data reinforced expectations that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates at least twice this year to prevent a recession.】

item.title: 日本基本工资增长更快，支持日本央行加息
item.description: 日本工人的基本工资增长加快，这对日本央行来说是一个积极的发展，因为即使在国内和全球经济风险增加的情况下，日本央行仍在寻找机会提高利率。【原文：Growth in Japanese workers’ base pay picked up, in a positive development for the Bank of Japan as authorities look for an opportunity to raise interest rates even as domestic and global economic risks mount.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯寻求更大幅度提高石油产量，石油跌幅扩大
item.description: 有迹象表明，沙特阿拉伯正寻求在下个月的欧佩克+会议上再次大幅增产，以争夺市场份额，这可能会加剧预计今年晚些时候将出现的供应过剩局面，石油市场因此延续跌势。【原文：Oil extended declines on signs Saudi Arabia is seeking another big production increase at next month’s OPEC+ meeting, in a bid for market share that could worsen a glut expected later this year.】

item.title: 英伟达董事披露出售 5.5 亿美元持仓的提议
item.description: 亿万富翁、英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）董事马克-史蒂文斯（Mark Stevens）本周抛售了 100 多万股该芯片制造商的股票，因为该公司股价从年初的低迷中反弹。【原文：Billionaire Nvidia Corp. director Mark Stevens unloaded more than 1 million shares of the chipmaker this week as the stock rebounds from a slow start to the year.】

item.title: 卡什卡利称美联储已做好等待关税影响的充分准备
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）表示，美国央行完全有能力在调整利率之前静观关税政策对经济的影响。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari said the US central bank is well positioned to wait and see how tariff policies impact the economy before adjusting interest rates.】

item.title: 日本太空碎片公司上市一年后价值缩水一半
item.description: 一年前，当 Astroscale 控股公司在东京开始交易时，人们对这家日本太空碎片先驱公司的热情高涨，股价飙升 62%，使其成为一家市值十亿美元的公司。【原文：When Astroscale Holdings Inc. began trading in Tokyo a year ago, excitement over the Japanese space-debris pioneer was riding so high that the stock surged 62%, making it a billion-dollar company.】

item.title: 芝加哥将债券销售额提高至 6.98 亿美元，高收益率为 5.6
item.description: 芝加哥周三出售了 6.98 亿美元的一般义务债券，其中免税证券的定价收益率高达 5.6%。【原文：Chicago sold $698 million of general obligation bonds Wednesday with tax-exempt securities priced to yield as much as 5.6%.】

item.title: Deliveroo 在都柏林推出无人机送餐服务
item.description: Deliveroo 与爱尔兰 Manna Drones 公司合作，在都柏林推出了无人机自动送餐服务。【原文：Deliveroo has launched an autonomous drone food delivery service in Dublin in partnership with Irish firm Manna Drones Inc.】

item.title: 英国房屋销售创三年新高，打破经济放缓担忧
item.description: 英国房地产市场在 5 月份迎来了三年多来最繁忙的一个月，打破了购房者减税政策到期后市场放缓的预期。【原文：Britain’s property market saw its busiest month in over three years in May, defying expectations for a slowdown after a tax break for buyers expired.】

item.title: 小红书估值达 260 亿美元，支持者金沙江创投获益匪浅
item.description: 在最近通过一家大型基金进行的市场交易中，小红书的估值飙升至 260 亿美元，上升速度异常之快，凸显了这家中国社交媒体公司如何在美国与 TikTok 展开竞争。【原文：Xiaohongshu’s valuation surged to $26 billion in recent market transactions via a major fund, an unusually fast ascent that underscores how the Chinese social media phenom is making headway against TikTok in the US.】

item.title: 任天堂粉丝争相购买价值 450 美元的 Switch 2 游戏机
item.description: 任天堂公司今天开始销售Switch 2，购物者们正在商店里寻找，以增加买到这款售价450美元的游戏机的机会。【原文：Nintendo Co. is opening sales of the Switch 2 today, and shoppers are scouting out stores to increase their chances of getting a hold of the $450 console.】

item.title: 鲍曼被参议院确认为美联储负责监管事务的副主席
item.description: 美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）周三被美国参议院确认为央行负责监管的副主席，这进一步表明，在唐纳德-特朗普总统的领导下，监管将向更宽松的方向转变。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman was confirmed by the US Senate on Wednesday to serve as the central bank’s vice chair for supervision, further signaling a shift to lighter regulation under President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 国债因美联储减息希望而反弹，股市触顶：市场综述
item.description: 由于不温不火的美国经济数据强化了美联储今年降息的预期，国债反弹。【原文：Treasuries rallied as tepid US economic data reinforced expectations for Federal Reserve interest rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 企业产品公司称美国将拒绝其中国乙烷出口许可
item.description: 美国企业产品合伙公司（Enterprise Products Partners LP）收到一份通知，称随着特朗普政府加倍加强对中国的出口安全，美国打算拒绝为三批拟运往中国的乙烷发放许可证。【原文：Enterprise Products Partners LP received a notice saying the US intends to deny licenses for three proposed cargoes of ethane heading to China as the Trump administration doubles down on security for exports to the country.】
